translated: The Story of the Elder Sandhita
In a banyan tree with green foliage
I attained a perception of the Buddha
In the past, thirty-one eons ago,
I attained the destruction of the pollutants.
In the past, thirteen eons ago,
there was a warrior named Dhaniṭṭha,
who was endowed with the seven treasures
and was a powerful universal monarch.
… and I accomplished the instruction of the Buddha.”🔽Thus the elder Sandhita recited these verses.
